text: Ara smarana kara, -- tomara prabhu phiris‌tadera balalena, “ami abasya'i prthibite khalipha basate yacchi.” Tara balala -- “tumi ki uhate emana ka'uke basaccha ye tara madhye phasada srsti karabe o raktapata karabe, athaca amara tomara stutira gunagana karachi o tomara'i pabitratara jayagana ga'ichi.” Tini balalena -- “ami nihsandehe ta jani ya tomara jano na.”
